des: "Don't let the mixture fool you. This sweet, tangy sauce has been in my family since my great grandma Murphy first passed on the recipe.  It is a wonderful addition to your classic St. Patrick's Day Dinner.  Pour over meat, cabbage and potatoes!"
ins: In a small saucepan over medium heat, mix together the ketchup, mint jelly, honey, red wine vinegar, and butter. Bring to a boil, then remove from the heat.
